articles.author: Amy Furr
articles.title: Apple to Temporarily Close Stores, Offices in China amid Virus Outbreak
articles.description: Apple Inc. announced Saturday that all of its stores and corporate offices in China will be closed until February 9 due to the coronavirus outbreak.
articles.content:
Apple Inc. announced Saturday that all of its stores and corporate offices in China will be closed until February 9 due to the coronavirus outbreak.

articles.title: TRAVEL BAN: Australia Shuts Down Travel from Coronavirus-hit China
articles.description: (AFP) -- The Australian government on Saturday said it would bar non-citizens arriving from mainland China from entering the country under new measures to combat the spread of the coronavirus epidemic.
articles.content:
(AFP) — The Australian government on Saturday said it would bar non-citizens arriving from mainland China from entering the country under new measures to combat the spread of the coronavirus epidemic.

articles.title: Americans Must Be Grateful to Immigrants, Says University Chief
articles.description: Americans must be told they should be grateful to immigrants, says a university executive who fears losing revenues amid the public's strong opposition to corporate immigration.

articles.author: Allum Bokhari
articles.title: Twitter Permanently Blacklists Zero Hedge Following BuzzFeed Hitpiece - Breitbart
articles.description: The alternative news site Zero Hedge has been permanently blacklisted from Twitter. The account had more than 650,000 followers at the time of its suspension from the platform.
articles.content:
The alternative news site Zero Hedge has been permanently blacklisted from Twitter. The account had more than 650,000 followers at the time of its suspension from the platform.
